item.title: Packer & Fedora Gotchas
item.description: It’s been a while! I’ve got lots on my blog-backlog but here’s a tidbit in case it helps anyone else out there. Lately, I’ve been working in virtual machines to strengthen my security posture for clients. There’s more to come on that, but for now I wanted to share a fix for a confusing problem I had. I was trying to install Fedora 31 as a Packer build. packr build fedora.
